title: Lowest Stock Market Performance
description: In 2022, Sri Lanka experienced a significant decline in its stock market, with the S&P Global Equity Indices showing an annual change of -62.44%.

title: High Interest Payments as a Percentage of Revenue
description: In 2023, interest payments in Sri Lanka accounted for 79.87% of the government's revenue, indicating a high debt servicing burden.

title: High Interest Payments as a Percentage of Expense
description: In 2023, interest payments constituted 49.44% of Sri Lanka's government expenses, reflecting a significant portion of the budget dedicated to debt servicing.

title: High Rate of Exclusive Breastfeeding
description: In 2016, 80.93% of children under 6 months in Sri Lanka were exclusively breastfed, highlighting strong breastfeeding practices.

title: Low Prevalence of Overweight in Children
description: In 2024, only 0.5% of children under 5 in Sri Lanka were overweight, indicating a low prevalence of overweight issues among young children.
